attributes.description:
Lindsay Saker has always been a part of your neighbourhood and a part of your life. We are South Africa's biggest Volkswagen, Audi, Select and Commercial vehicle dealer network.When you buy a Volkswagen, you know you are getting so much more than just a car. After Sales Service and support is the next stage in your journey. We are a committed dealer with world-class experts to ensure that you and your Volkswagen are always taken care of. We at Lindsay Saker Vereeniging is your dealer. 

We accept Trade We offer finance, all banks. All vehicles come with a Road worthy certificate, 80-Point check, Quality Valet
Price excludes any documentation fees and on road costs. . .

WARRANTY IS ACTIVE FROM 2021/04/30 TILL 2024/04/30 OR 120000 KM

attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Diep River Used Cars
attributes.description:
Balance of 72months/91500km Complimentary Service Plan
ENQUIRE NOW and you will be connected to one of our professional sales executives who will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. ENQUIRE NOW and we will tailor make a finance package that will not only suite your need but you pocket too as we deal through all major finance institutions and will fight for the best rate in town. ALL TRADE INS WELCOME AND WE OFFER NATIONWIDE DELIVERY

All our vehicles have passed our stringent 160-point check
Our vehicles have a full-service history
None of our vehicles have been registered for more than 5 years old
Our vehicles have a maximum mileage of 120 000km
We get our cars’ mileage readings verified
Our vehicles come with the balance of Manufacturer’s Warranty - or a new warranty
The Balance of the Service Plan and Maintenance Plan is included
We offer Roadside Assistance for 12 months
We accept all trade-ins
We offer test drives on all our used vehicle

attributes.description:
This sporty fresh GOLF 7.5R 2.0 TSI DSG (228KW) is up for grabs! Loaded with epic features such as - DynAudio excite sound system, auto LED headlights, panoramic sunroof, leather seats, ambient lighting, blind spot monitor, multi function steering wheel, adaptive cruise control, paddle shift, virtual cluster, lap timer, rear traffic alert, front assist, dual climate control, touch screen media interface, bluetooth, voice control, front and rear parking sensors, reverse camera, carbon mirrors, auto dimming mirrors, keyless start/stop, eco start/stop function and more! 
	Shop for a new car or used car, start your research Online here, You will find great Inventory of cars for sale by local car dealers.
